sentences.sentence: After my RAI , I became hypothyroid and now have to take levothyroid.
sentences.translation: 在放射性碘治疗以后，我变成甲减，必须服用左旋甲状腺激素。

sentences.sentence: Objective To study the value on apply of neonatal hypothyroid index (NHI).
sentences.translation: 目的探索新生儿甲状腺指数(NHI)的应用价值。

sentences.sentence: Of this group 82% had a hypothyroid phase during the first postpartum year.
sentences.translation: 其中82%在产后第一年存在甲减阶段。
